reviews.text:
🏯The Pavillion was originally built to house the Berlin Wall.
🪦It was removed and returned to the owner in 2013, after 3 years permanent loan.
👖A sculptured art piece of Berlin Wall is displayed near Gym Pod @ Bedok Reservior.
🧠Fun Fact:
👖👖There is another two segments of the Berlin Wall in Singapore located on a slope along College Ave East, beside University Town, NUS.
👖👖These two segments was gifted to Singapore in 2015 to mark 50 yrs of diplomatic relations between Singapore and Germany.
